dct_description_sm: Includes bibliographical references (p. xv-xvi) and indexes.
Northwestern part of California shown with nearly flat north coast.
LC 3447, 4280; BN Manesson-Mallet I A(76) & I B.
At page top, above map: DU GLOBE TERRESTRE. [Page] 213[,] FIGURE LXXVI. [Page] 213 (map top right), O iij (below map, bottom right). Issued in his: Description de L’Univers. Tome I. – Paris, 1683.
Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des ganzen Welt-Kreisses …, I, Franckfurt, 1684.

At page top, above map: Das Mitternächtliche Vesteland. Fig 76. With French title inside border and German title outside border. Issued in his Description de L’Univers … Chez Jean David Zunner…Francfurt, 1685. Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des gantzen weltkreises…, J. A. Jung … Franckfurt am Mayn, 1719.
Glen McLaughlin with Nancy H. Mayo.
